articles.title: Upcoming Session
articles.description: 📅 Next Session: Wednesday, 25 June 2025 🕖 7:00 PM - 9:00 PM @ National Badminton Centre, MK8 9LA - Courts 4 & 6 🏸

articles.title: Sri & Rav, Men's Doubles Champions! 🏆
articles.description: 🎉 Huge congratulations to Sri & Rav for clinching the Men's Doubles Champion title at the Gemstars Summer Smash 2025! A spectacular performance in the final. Being 1 game down and Rav on 1 leg, they both produced a brilliant display to come out champions!!! 🥇🔥

articles.title: Raj, Mixed Doubles Runners-Up! 🥈
articles.description: 👏 An outstanding performance by Raj secured the Runners-Up position in Mixed Doubles at the Gemstars Summer Smash 2025! 💪🏸

articles.title: Team Chooses Yehlex again! 🗳️🏸
articles.description: 🗳️ After a team-wide poll, Yehlex emerged as the chosen shuttle brand! Despite Airchy's impressive flight, Yehlex wins on consistency and durability. Shipping delays and variability cost Airchy the crown. 👑

articles.title: Prabhu Joins the Squad! 🎉🏸
articles.description: A huge welcome to Prabhu, our newest Cobra! 🐍 Looking forward to more epic midweek matchups! Let the rallies begin! 💪

articles.title: Sri wins MKSM Doubles Championship! 🏆2025! 🎉🏸
articles.description: Warmest congratulations to Sri on his well-deserved victory in the doubles championship at the MKSM 2025 tournament! 🏆💪

articles.title: Airchy Makes a Debut! ✈️🏸
articles.description: We tried out Airchy shuttles and the team loved their flight and feel.

articles.title: Phyo Joins Cobra Smash! 🙌🏸
articles.description: A big Cobra Smash welcome to Phyo! 💥 Looking forward to thrilling games and unforgettable rallies every Wednesday! 🐍

articles.title: Shuttle Trials end with Yehlex 🚀🧐
articles.description: We tested a variety of shuttle brands including Kawasaki, Ashaway, Babolat, Perfly, and Victor. After a solid smash test, Yehlex emerged as the favourite among the team! 🏸👍
